text: Jerry L. Crispino (April 17, 1930 – March 20, 2009) was an American politician who served in the New York City Council from the 14th district from 1975 to 1991. He died on March 20, 2009, in Pelham Manor, New York at age 78. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2009 deaths Category:New York City Council members Category:New York (state) Democrats
title: Jerry L. Crispino
